reviewText:
these are great movies for the whole family to watch a must for the go kart lover....
my son and i both race karts it's a great hobby to bond with your child...

Well, both DVD's have Karting content. That is the positive. The negative is they are not a documentary or action video. They lean towards the cheap 80's style action video converted from VHS than anything else (cheap-porno music included). Look for the "Oversteer" DVD if you want something that looks like it was made in the last decade.
